Code Examples

Language class on code element

def hello():
    print("Hello, World!")
    return True

Data-language on pre element

interface Config {
  name: string;
  version: number;
}

Data-lang on pre element

fn main() {
    println!("Hello, Rust!");
}

Data-lang on code element

func main() {
    fmt.Println("Hello, Go!")
}
